Review Text: Do not waste your time. Not even Gerard Butler, Andy Garcia or Ed Harris could save this money. I thought it would just be a cheesy disaster movie like San Andreas but it was bad and boring. I almost asked for a refund.
Review Title: Great actors couldn't save this one.  BAD!

reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Harold Cronk'], 'Producers': ['Michael Scott', 'Russell Wolfe', 'David A.R. White', 'Anna Zielinski', 'Elizabeth Travis'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Sorbo', 'Shane Harper', 'David A.R. White'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Loved it!  I am a movie lover of all types of movies and I loved this.  I have watched lots of Christian movies but this one may be there very best.  I learned a lot and I was surprised as the movie went on.  Some Christian movies don't have big budgets and some have totally expected endings but this one was different.  The acting was great and I was very impressed with Kevin Sorbo's performance.  I can't wait to watch it again to see what I missed the first time.  I would definitely recommend!
Awesome movie!  Can't wait to watch again.
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Neil Burger'], 'Producers': ['Douglas Wick', 'Lucy Fisher', 'Pouya Shahbazian'], 'Starring': ['Shailene Woodley', 'Theo James', 'Ashley Judd'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
I Love It!!  My whole family really enjoyed it and we think we liked it even better than the Hunger Games movies. Also, it was nice to have such a great movie that didn't have anything I wanted to keep my 12 year-old from seeing.
Liked it more than we thought!
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Chris Carter'], 'Producers': ['Chris Carter', 'Marc Rosen', 'Gabe Rotter'], 'Starring': ['Aldis Hodge', 'Andrew Howard', 'Arielle Kebbel']}
I enjoyed the first part of the show but the amount of F Bombs was ridiculous!  Even some of the toughest R rated movies I have seen had less bad language.  I really thought it was a joke at first.  Once we got to the end, I thought it was just plan evil.  Lots of reviews give spoilers about this so I am not giving too much away but the creature at the end just looks evil.  I won't watch again.
Not a great show and the language was ridiculous!

Do You Believe? (DVD)
Mira Sorvino  (Actor),     Sean Astin  (Actor),     Jonathan M. Gunn  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
["A dozen different souls—all moving in different directions, all longing for something more. As their lives unexpectedly intersect, they each are about to discover there is power in the Cross of Christ…even if they don't yet believe it. When a local pastor is shaken to the core by the visible faith of an old street-corner preacher, he is reminded that true belief always requires action. His response ignites a faith-fueled journey that powerfully impacts everyone it touches in ways that only God could orchestrate. More than a movie, it's a question we all must answer in our lifetimes: Do You Believe?", 'Bonus Content:', 'Interviews', 'Interviews', 'Trailers', 'Trailers', ']]>']

I consider myself a movie-buff and I watch all kinds of movies. Love this movie! I love the way the stories intertwine. Wonderful faith-based movies with lots of good acting. Well-made and emotional.
Well-made movie wirh good acting.
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Auturo Gavino'], 'Producers': ['John Waldron', 'Craig McMahon'], 'Starring': ['Savanah McMahon', 'Julie Van Lith'], 'Studio': ['Faith House Pictures']}
Loved it! I watch lots of movies both Christian and secular and this was great. It brought me to tears and there were light-hearted moments too.  I am Christian and it had those elements but it was a great a story and the faith element was a bonus. So nice to see a clean and very entertaining movie. Give it a try!
Really enjoyed this movie! Great story!

profile:
The user is a devoted movie enthusiast with a strong preference for Christian films that feature quality storytelling and emotional depth. Their recent positive review of an engaging narrative reflects a commitment to well-crafted stories that evoke genuine emotions, as they favor films that skillfully balance complexity with lighthearted moments, eliciting both laughter and tears. Inclusivity is vital to their viewing experience, as they appreciate features like audio descriptions and multilingual captions. They maintain strict boundaries regarding language, evidenced by low ratings for films with excessive profanity, preferring content that is family-friendly.

In their latest interaction, the user expressed significant disappointment in a film despite having a renowned cast, rating it poorly and emphasizing its lack of engagement and excitement. This reaction underscores their high standards for impactful storytelling and narrative quality. The user's passion for films that promote personal reflection and growth is evident, as they actively recommend titles aligned with values of meaningful engagement and emotional authenticity. Overall, their preferences indicate a dedication to high-quality cinema that not only entertains but also resonates on deeper levels, fostering a connection to uplifting and heartfelt narratives.
